name: Propitious Screen: Overlapping Clouds Above Peaks
description: A folding screen delicately crafted by the most skillful artisans. Its frame is made from Sandbearer Wood with a vermillion finish, and the finest silk was selected as its fabric. Among the multitude of splendid decorations at the Lantern Rite, this folding screen can be considered a rare masterpiece. The painting on it depicts overlapping mountains and clouds. The magnificent view seems to stretch infinitely on as if painted on a scroll...
